Posts.Content: hi the machine does not come to close and takes less then a minute each of the two times its on so very quick and painless. the longest part for me has been waiting around and the machine broke last week 3 hours wait yuck. So no worries easy bit now. jenny xx

Posts.Title: Unfaithful husband

Posts.Content: HI cazza Noone can really tell you what to do only you know i you can forgive him this is a bad time for upset in your life take your time no hasty decisions sek advice from a solicitor know all your options for you and your children go to relate on your own if necessary they are good. Just dont rush  into anything give yourself  time have you family? jenny x

Posts.Title: Weeks following mx

Posts.Content: hi i had my mx on the 14th nov and full node ckearance on the 5th dec its not nearly as bad as i thought only took painkillers for a few days. it is a bit difficult to get clothes over your head so buttons are good. its the chemo im dreading so you will be fine the drains are a pain but soon gone good luck jenny x

Posts.Content: hi the exercises are realy important with this as it takes longer to recover then from mx 6 weeks on i still do them. a pillow under his arm when sitting should help lots of tlc is he home today ? if so he will have drains in so these are a pain but soon gone good luck jenny x
Posts.Title: Men and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: hi I have a problem with body image since my mx i just cant look at it i feel vain and self obsorbed but i cant help it, everyone else seems so well adjusted. i undress in dark wash in dark wont let my partner near. Just dont know what to do im an eEor F cup at least i was just cant accept things its all so quick although surgery was on 14th november so two months post op. Ive forced myself to post this never seen anyone post something like this on here. ITt isnt that i liked a big bust because i didnt   jenny x
